website_summaries.verdict: The latest 13-inch Apple MacBook Air updates one of the best ultraportables around making it faster and more powerful, while proving that some things don't need to change at all.
pros: More than 12 hours of battery life

customer_reviews.title: Beware Cheap/Defunct Battery
customer_reviews.text: The machine itself is great, but be aware that buying off this seller means it's only guaranteed for 12 months. That would be fine if all its parts were Apple standard - but they don't seem to be. After 18 months and only 95 cycles, my battery has given up the ghost. Apple informs me that the battery should be guaranteed for a minimum of 2 years and should certainly perform fine until then. Mine hasn't.
customer_reviews.author: Em Strang

customer_reviews.title: badly refurbished
customer_reviews.text: As soon as i opened the Macbook Air i realised the screen has been changed for a low quality one, my roomate has the same but original version and it was really obvious ! Furthermore the corners were damaged, not standard as "refurbish" should be !
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Kunde

customer_reviews.title: wonderful product, have made my day and enhanced my ...
customer_reviews.text: well packaged,prompt delivery,wonderful product,have made my day and enhanced my lifestyle. Wish I had acted sooner to upgrade .
customer_reviews.author: Capt Joseph Gaffrey

customer_reviews.title: Hong Kong company not replying in spite of high rating
customer_reviews.text: Meant to be a premium product but now failed completely. Apple tell me I should get free repair out with warranty because of consumer rights but as this is 3rd party I have struggled to make contact.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs M.

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic laptop. This is my first ever Macbook Air ...
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic laptop. This is my first ever Macbook Air and it was purchased to replace my iPad Air. The laptop has more functionality and is very easy to use. It's study and well built. Also it' s a lot faster than my iPad. I can't recommend this product enough.
customer_reviews.author: efticar hussain

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant - but then it is Apple
customer_reviews.text: Brilliant - but then it is Apple! Always bought Dell and Windows before. Very fast and have been able to install Mac version of Word, Excel etc. Just superb. no other word for it!
customer_reviews.author: Ringwood Margaret & Mike

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE MY MAC AND IT WAS GREAT VALUE FOR THE MONEY. I WILL SHOP HERE AGAIN.

customer_reviews.text: Had to completely reset it - was an issue also the side of the keyboard had a minor nick in it.

customer_reviews.title: Still going strong.
customer_reviews.text: Got for my son 4 years ago and still going strong. No worries about viruses etc.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

customer_reviews.text: This is a great piece of kit which has converted me for ever from the Windows based systems.

customer_reviews.text: Great buy and great price. American keyboard but that's no problem. Just set it up for UK English. It's light, fast and good size.

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic product
customer_reviews.text: Best product I have ever bought - absolutely love it

customer_reviews.title: A great tool.
customer_reviews.text: A great tool... and good phone backup too if any probs crop up.. should have gone Apple from the start; a decade of manuscript corrupted my old Microsoft PC was not fun.

customer_reviews.title: brilliant
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality and perfect for my needs at a fantastic price

customer_reviews.title: but it runs like a dream
customer_reviews.text: Honestly the hardest thing on earth to set up using he's from windows, but it runs like a dream. Best piece of kit ever.

customer_reviews.title: Light and worth the price!
customer_reviews.text: A great laptop, I'd recommend to anyone! Didn't really consider the weight when I bought it, but it is amazingly light! You can comfortably carry it in one hand!

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Amazing!! Best in the market long battery duration very light and compact

customer_reviews.title: I love my Mac Air
customer_reviews.text: I love my Mac Air, it is very light, fast and covers all my needs. I used to be Windows users but I completely falling in love with Mac now.

customer_reviews.text: Awesome laptop. Nice design as with all Apple products, super speedy and great battery life. The operating system is very efficient

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased so far with my new Macbook Air
customer_reviews.text: Ordered 3pm Thursday, delivered 9am Friday. Very pleased so far with my new Macbook Air :)

customer_reviews.title: Apple IMac
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with my purchase. Excellent service from Amazon as usual.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very good
customer_reviews.text: I do like Apple products so the 5 stars may be a bit biased . It looks fantastic and once you get used to using the OS it seems a lot quicker than my windows laptop. I've fitted extra memory , the standard 128Gb just isn't enough (probably should have gone for the 256Gb). The only negative is the display , its ok for most applications but its limitations are shown when playing HD video. This is my first Apple computer and definitely won't be my last.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. A. Eaton

customer_reviews.title: Good Kit
customer_reviews.text: Best bit of kit I have bought in a long time.

customer_reviews.title: Never had an Apple device but trurly love it. Unbelievably light and so fast and responsive ...
customer_reviews.text: Never had an Apple device but trurly love it. Unbelievably light and so fast and responsive to opening new pas.

customer_reviews.title: stated item at well below the UK RRP
customer_reviews.text: Be prepared for lengthy delivery time, felt like a bit of a leap of faith but it is indeed the stated item at well below the UK RRP.

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant piece of tech
customer_reviews.text: Brilliant piece of tech. Bought windows for Mac also, best of both worlds! My daughter loves it for her studies.

customer_reviews.text: Item was as described and dispatched extremely quickly!, came with UK Plug / keyboard!

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Developed fault inside year of purchase and no warranty included by seller

customer_reviews.title: I am very satisfied with the product
customer_reviews.text: I am very satisfied with the product. It works very well and it is very light. I am very happy with my first Apple! I think it is worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Zuzana Kucharova

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent machine easy to operate. I also had a free upgrade on the new Yosemite operating system
customer_reviews.author: James T.

customer_reviews.text: Really happy with this product no problems at all. Exactly what you expect and want.
customer_reviews.author: Danial

customer_reviews.title: Very Happy
customer_reviews.text: Arrived quickly. Very good price for a top range computer. No problems so far. Very happy.
customer_reviews.author: James Colin Wight

customer_reviews.title: Really pleased
customer_reviews.text: It shipped very fast and was well packaged, it came with the MagSafe 2 charger and the laptop has no marks and it feels new, it came with the latest software installed and is fairly fast
customer_reviews.author: Jack Earnshaw

customer_reviews.title: I would love this apart from the fact that my model has ...
customer_reviews.text: I would love this apart from the fact that my model has a US keyboard, despite being advertised as having a UK keyboard - the lack of a GBP symbol is very annoying! I didn't really this immediately, unfortunately.
customer_reviews.author: Judith H.

customer_reviews.title: I'm very happy with the price
customer_reviews.text: Hi, I'm very happy with the price, delivery and laptop. USA keyboard, not important for me. Highly recommended. See you next time.
customer_reviews.author: Pepe

customer_reviews.title: Super fast delivery to France
customer_reviews.text: Super fast delivery to France. Was able to track it right up to 'out for delivery' which is so helpful as it had to be signed for. Beautifully light and quick to respond when opening up or returning to a sleeping screen. Good price. It is a USA model but I expected this. It doesn't bother me. When needing a € or £ sign it's option +3 for £ and alt -2 gives the €. Simples! It's an Apple Mac what's more to add?
customer_reviews.author: Jenn

customer_reviews.title: BEWARE - BEWARE - "Not stated in the product description"
customer_reviews.text: BEWARE - BEWARE - "Not stated in the product description" Came with a US keyboard which is not stated in the product description. You buy the upgraded version of these in the states for £683. Should be a lot cheaper as it's not the UK version ... It's a con!
customer_reviews.author: Neil kerfoot

customer_reviews.title: Beware: comes with US keyboard
customer_reviews.text: Came with a US keyboard which is not stated in the product description. So I sent it back.
customer_reviews.author: IMC

customer_reviews.title: What's the catch?
customer_reviews.text: I needed a new laptop to replace my eight year old MacBook Pro. I looked EVERYWHERE for the best deal. This was the cheapest by far even though it was an import. And that is the point - cheap! Almost too cheap to be true - because it didn't work. Switched on, worked for two or three minutes (just long enough for me to think how great it was), then the screen when black and three beeps sounded - catastrophic memory error. The lesson? Go to the Apple Store!
customer_reviews.author: Mark Wilkinson

customer_reviews.title: Windows again? No, thanks
customer_reviews.text: Bought my Macbook Air £170 cheaper than high street. Comes with 3 pin UK charger and US keyboard which doesnt make any difference to me (there is no £ sign on keyboard but once you set up your keyboard as UK at the start up then it's option+ 3) Delivered in 4 days. So far i m happy with the product. Super fast, sleek and battery lasts 6-7 hours easy! Once i get used to new OS; i dont think i will be going back to slow and confusing windows 8. Seller's communication wasn't great as i asked for a tracking number for parcel but never heard anything.
customer_reviews.author: Cihan Akan

customer_reviews.title: superb
customer_reviews.text: Great service, brand new,latest 2014 model. Running the Mavericks OS X. However does come with US keyboard. very happy with it, great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Kash

customer_reviews.title: Sooo much better than a PC
customer_reviews.text: I love the MacBook Air. I had one myself and bought this one for our daughter. It's fast, realise and the battery lasts all day after charging.
customer_reviews.author: Tim D

customer_reviews.title: Love the MacBook Air
customer_reviews.text: Love the MacBook Air! This is my first time using a Mac having switched from Windows and can honestly say it's been an easy transition. Very happy with my decision, and the product! Fast delivery and although it's a US keyboard (which they kindly informed me via email before I verified the purchase) which is fine because they also sent instructions on how to configure your keyboard and get the £ sign. Would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Sophie

customer_reviews.title: Died after one week
customer_reviews.text: Worked nicely for a week, then died.... Wanted to return it for a replacement or refund but Amazon would not take responsibility for the security of the data on the laptop (passwords, emails etc). I am now faced with the hassle of sending it off for a repair and waiting for its return which is less than ideal. I think next time I will pay the extra and buy from a high street store.
customer_reviews.author: Nic292

customer_reviews.title: Worth the switch from Windows
customer_reviews.text: I've always used Windows and thought a Mac wouldn't be worth the money, but I only had my old Windows 8 laptop for a few months and its performance was already lagging... so decided to switch to a Macbook and so far haven't regretted it! It looks great, very fast (puts my old one to shame!), and long battery life. Perfect for students like me. If you're used to Windows for so long then it might take a bit of getting used to, but it's definitely worth the switch in my opinion. Also if you're confused by the advert like I was, it came with the latest OS.
customer_reviews.author: AM94

customer_reviews.title: ... it is a little slower than I imagined I love it.
customer_reviews.text: Nevertheless it is a little slower than I imagined I love it .
customer_reviews.author: Nicole112

customer_reviews.title: berry nice
customer_reviews.text: awesome, love it. super slim and light. exactly what I need for uni.
customer_reviews.author: Kat
